DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomize study design investigate benefit use Filter-Protection-Device ( Claret MontageTM Dual Filter System ) transcatheter aortic valve implantation ( TAVI ) Medtronic CoreValve® .
DOC.brief_title: CLaret Embolic Protection ANd TAVI - Trial
DOC.criteria: Subject must schedule undergo endovascular aortic valve prosthesis ( Medtronic CoreValve® ) implant procedure femoral artery intend access site valve delivery system . Patient unsuitable TAVI Prior Stroke TIA last 12 month Carotic stenosis > 70 % Relevant stenosis brachiocephalic trunc right subclavian artery Expected Noncompliance followups Pregnancy Patient already recruit another study
